Best practices linters

Source: R/linter_tag_docs.R
best_practices_linters.Rd

Linters checking the use of coding best practices, such as explicit typing of numeric constants.

See also

linters for a complete list of linters available in lintr.

Linters

The following linters are tagged with 'best_practices':

  • absolute_path_linter

  • any_duplicated_linter

  • any_is_na_linter

  • boolean_arithmetic_linter

  • class_equals_linter

  • commented_code_linter

  • condition_call_linter

  • condition_message_linter

  • conjunct_test_linter

  • cyclocomp_linter

  • empty_assignment_linter

  • expect_comparison_linter

  • expect_length_linter

  • expect_named_linter

  • expect_not_linter

  • expect_null_linter

  • expect_s3_class_linter

  • expect_s4_class_linter

  • expect_true_false_linter

  • expect_type_linter

  • fixed_regex_linter

  • for_loop_index_linter

  • function_argument_linter

  • function_return_linter

  • if_switch_linter

  • ifelse_censor_linter

  • implicit_assignment_linter

  • implicit_integer_linter

  • is_numeric_linter

  • length_levels_linter

  • lengths_linter

  • library_call_linter

  • list_comparison_linter

  • literal_coercion_linter

  • outer_negation_linter

  • paste_linter

  • print_linter

  • regex_subset_linter
